channel.title: New Game
channel.description:
Well this summer i did'nt do much but play games and hang out with friends... I pretty much played every game i could think of and all of them got boring cause ive probally been playing them since they came out. So i need a new game that i could start playing! I don't want to have to pay for the game cause i payed for WoW for years and no longer want to waste money on that kind of stuff. I really want it to be a online game that you interact with other people ETC. Also there are a few games that I don't want people to mention which will be listed below.
[b]GAMES NOT TO SUGGEST:[/b]
runescape World of Warcraft Knights Online Diablo 2 Ultima Online Guild Wars Counter-Strike Counter-Strike: SOURCE Pretty much none of the steam games! (prob own them all) Guild Wars Ever Quest ( have to pay for it and i don't want to do that) Americas Army Maple Story Warcraft 3 (OR ANY OF THEM! Can't play online the real bnet without paying for the game) Heroes Online StartCraft (NONE OF THEM) Warrock No gay flash games
Thats all the game that I ether already played or just don't want to play them cause they SUCK! lol.
[b]Type of Games I Like:[/b]
FPS RPG MMORPG ( A DEFF LIKE) Racing Strategy
Yea so please help me find a good game that i could start playing cause i'm really bored and have nothing else to do ATM and all my other game are getitng pretty boring. ( Sorry for typos just little tired today)
[b][size=15pt]EDIT:[/size][/b] Oh yea if the game is bottable I will Deff want to maybe start botting that game.. I love botting games and then selling them or something.

item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:16, topic:141270”][quote author=Speakerboxxx link=topic=193481.msg1739725#msg1739725 date=1189265373]
Assassins Creed, looks really nice.

UT2007

UT2004 was already one of my favorite games so im thinking that UT2007 will be the best game ever.
[/quote]

Yeah those are great too. Oh yeah theres Halo 3 as well.[/quote]
I preordered that!.. Well dad did for me…

Read full topic

item.title: New Game
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:9, topic:141270”][quote author=mrrules link=topic=193481.msg1739334#msg1739334 date=1189244200]

i would recommend ragnarok online.

Private server : http://www.sharkro.com
Real pay game: http://iro.ragnarokonline.com/

Agh I played that game also… Gets really boring and don’t you have to pay for that game after a few days?
[/quote]depends. if you get a P-server or the real game. private servers are like Rs p-servers. Better then the real game, but not as populated depending on the server and sometimes a lot of glitches that ruin the game. and usually there are better things.

I have played ragnarok many times with different servers (aboout 7), and I think that one is the best.[/quote]
I really don’t want to get into the hole private server thing again… Ive played/Owned WoW private servers and it is way too many glitches that ruin the game or not anuff people on the server.

FastBawlz:

WarHammer .

Going to look this game up and see what it is TY for suggestions guy!

Read full topic

Agh I played that game also… Gets really boring and don’t you have to pay for that game after a few days?[/quote]depends. if you get a P-server or the real game. private servers are like Rs p-servers. Better then the real game, but not as populated depending on the server and sometimes a lot of glitches that ruin the game. and usually there are better things.

I have played ragnarok many times with different servers (aboout 7), and I think that one is the best.
